channel.title: Salvia Miltiorrhiza on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Salvia Miltiorrhiza on funPlantGenes

item.title: SmCPS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmCPS1 Gene Name: copalyl diphosphate synthase1 Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: The ethylene response factor SmERF6 co-regulates the transcription of SmCPS1 and SmKSL1 and is involved in tanshinone biosynthesis in Salvia miltiorrhiza hairy roots.

item.title: SmERF115
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: SMil_00025335 Gene Symbol: SmERF115 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: The SmMYB36-SmERF6/SmERF115 module regulates the biosynthesis of tanshinones and phenolic acids in salvia miltiorrhiza hairy roots.

item.title: SmERF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: SMil_00020272 Gene Symbol: SmERF6 Gene Name: ethylene responsive factor 6 Genome: miltiorrhiza online information resource (http://bi.

item.title: SmERF73
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmERF73 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 73 Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: The ERF-VII transcription factor SmERF73 coordinately regulates tanshinone biosynthesis in response to stress elicitors in Salvia miltiorrhiza.

item.title: SmJAZ8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmJAZ8 Gene Name: jasmonate ZIM-domain protein 8 Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: SmJAZ8 acts as a core repressor regulating JA-induced biosynthesis of salvianolic acids and tanshinones in Salvia miltiorrhiza hairy roots.

item.title: SmKFB5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmKFB5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: SmKFB5 protein regulates phenolic acid biosynthesis by controlling the degradation of phenylalanine ammonia-lyase in Salvia miltiorrhiza.

item.title: SmKSL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmKSL1 Gene Name: kaurene synthase1 Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: The ethylene response factor SmERF6 co-regulates the transcription of SmCPS1 and SmKSL1 and is involved in tanshinone biosynthesis in Salvia miltiorrhiza hairy roots.

item.title: SmMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: SmiContig1043 Gene Symbol: SmMYB1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Description: In the current study, we identified the MeJA-responsive R2R3-MYB transcription factor-encoding gene SmMYB1 from an S.

item.title: SmMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: SmiContig1859 Gene Symbol: SmMYB2 Gene Name: Genome: S.

item.title: SmMYB36
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmMYB36 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: SmMYB36, a Novel R2R3-MYB Transcription Factor, Enhances Tanshinone Accumulation and Decreases Phenolic Acid Content in Salvia miltiorrhiza Hairy Roots.

item.title: SmNPR4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: c16843.graph_c0 Gene Symbol: SmNPR4 Gene Name: NPR protein 4 Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: The SmNPR4-SmTGA5 module regulates SA-mediated phenolic acid biosynthesis in Salvia miltiorrhiza hairy roots.

item.title: SmTGA5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: SMil_00004488 Gene Symbol: SmTGA5 Gene Name: leucine zipper family transcription factor 5 Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: The SmNPR4-SmTGA5 module regulates SA-mediated phenolic acid biosynthesis in Salvia miltiorrhiza hairy roots.
